item.title: About
item.description: Michael Hackett is producing multiple feature films through his company Rubicon Media including FLASH GORDON, THE PHANTOM and ONE MINUTE TO MIDNIGHT at Fox/Disney, and LOW-G, TIMEQUAKE and HASSLEMAN at Universal. Previously, he produced ADJUSTMENT BUREAU at Universal/MRC in partnership with writer-director George Nolfi, and PAYCHECK at Paramount/Dreamworks, both based on Philip K. Dick short stories. Prior to that, Hackett was a production executive at Mario Kassar and Andy Vajna’s C-2 Pictures where he oversaw development and production of TERMINATOR 3, and developed TERMINATOR 4, and was a producer at John Davis’s Davis Entertainment (PREDATOR franchise, GARFIELD, DR DOOLITTLE, ‘The Blacklist,’ ‘Timeless’)
